name: C_COMPLEX_OBJECT
documentation: Constraint on complex objects, i.e. any object that consists of other object constraints.

attributes.name: attributes
attributes.documentation: List of constraints on attributes of the reference model type represented by this object.

any_allowed.name: any_allowed
any_allowed.documentation: True if any value of the reference model type being constrained is allowed.

invariants.Attributes_valid: any_allowed xor (attributes /= Void and not attributes.is_empty)
